issue.title: [CF 560] impending victory back ^^
issue.body:
While ignoring gcd on bar and spell each time i use Impending victory (war talent ) every other spell tracj flash on and off  on  gcd  till teh cooldown of  impending  victory is up  .It  happen on ly if i use impending victory even if i don't track it
